section.heading: Status report.
section.text: The Mayor shall submit a status report by January 1, 2011, and on January 1 of each year thereafter, to the Council, which shall include the:

para.text: Outcome of the care provided for each surrendered newborn; and
Number and disposition of cases of surrendered newborns.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 107 of Newborn Safe Haven Emergency Act of 2009 (D.C. Act 18-321, March 1, 2010, 57 DCR 1842).
